song_lyrics: Sakhī dhanya dhanya bhāgya e bhomnā,
Rath hānke re jyā sundar Shyām; rathjātrā Ghanshyāmnī... tek
Haiḍāmā re kāī harakh na māy... 1
Hem ponchī re marmāḷā ne hāth... 3
Kāju sonerī re nang jaḍit kaṭār... 4
Haiyā rāje re moṭīḍā kero hār... 6
title: Sakhī dhanya dhanya bhāgya e bhomnā

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-214: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Utsavna Pad
